DOC.detailed_description: Each subject ask perform five activity one continuous sequence : ( 1 ) stand chair , ( 2 ) walk stair , ( 3 ) walk stair , ( 4 ) level walking , ( 5 ) deep knee bend . Subjects video record waist performing activity . The speed level trial base comfort level patient . The fluoroscopic image store digitally subsequent analysis secure server workstation University Tennessee .
DOC.criteria: At least 6 month postop Between 4070 year age Body weight less 250lbs TKA patient judge clinically successful American Knee Society score great 90 Must postop passive flexion 100 degree ligamentous laxity pain Participants must able walk level ground without aid ascend/descend stair without assistance . Subjects either ConforMISâ„¢ TKA traditional TKA manufacture orthopaedic company . Patients must 160cm ( 5 ' 3 ) 193cm ( 6 ' 4 ) tall .
